name: Planet TD (itch)
description: Come and explore the mystic world of a strange planet. Ten years ago, your home world has been destroyed. Your only hope was to find a new home so you began to explore the galaxy. Finally you found a habitable planet, but there is only one problem... It is full of mystical creatures like vampires, frenzied rabbits, oozes, ghosts and spiders. It seems like you don`t have to choose, at least until you will find another one. Good luck Captain!
